translations: 离子发生器（ionizer 的复数）

sentences.sentence: Vehicle: Used for holding various and large items-cell phones, sunglasses, air fresheners, ionizers, napkins, cigarettes, various plastic CARDS inside the vehicle. Front and rear panel of the car.
sentences.translation: 汽车：适用在仪表台或行李箱盖板等区域安放各种小型或大型物件-—手机、太阳镜、空气清新剂、空气净化器、餐巾纸盒、香烟盒、停车卡、高速公路卡或其他日用品。
